changeSet.author: yuzdzhan.ahmed
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO flight_status (status) SELECT DISTINCT flight_status FROM historical_flight_raw WHERE flight_status IS NOT NULL AND flight_status NOT IN (SELECT status FROM flight_status);

changeSet.author: yuzdzhan.ahmed
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO timezones (timezone) SELECT DISTINCT timezone FROM cities_raw WHERE timezone IS NOT NULL AND timezone NOT IN (SELECT timezone FROM timezones);

changeSet.author: yuzdzhan.ahmed
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO cities (city_name, timezone_id, iata_code) SELECT cr.city_name, tz.id, cr.iata_code FROM cities_raw cr JOIN timezones tz ON cr.timezone = tz.timezone WHERE cr.city_name IS NOT NULL GROUP BY cr.city_name, tz.id, cr.iata_code HAVING COUNT(*) = 1;

changeSet.author: yuzdzhan.ahmed
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO aircraft_type (iata_code, type) SELECT iata_code, aircraft_name FROM aircraft_type_raw WHERE iata_code NOT IN (SELECT iata_code FROM aircraft_type) AND iata_code IS NOT NULL AND aircraft_name IS NOT NULL;

changeSet.author: yuzdzhan.ahmed
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO airport (airport_name, iata_code, city_id) SELECT DISTINCT ar.airport_name, ar.iata_code, c.id FROM airport_raw ar JOIN cities c ON ar.city_iata_code = c.iata_code LEFT JOIN airport a ON ar.airport_name = a.airport_name AND ar.iata_code = a.iata_code WHERE ar.airport_name IS NOT NULL AND ar.iata_code IS NOT NULL AND c.id IS NOT NULL AND a.id IS NULL;

changeSet.author: yuzdzhan.ahmed
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO airline (airline_name, icao_code, iata_code) SELECT DISTINCT airline_name, icao_code, iata_code FROM airline_raw WHERE airline_name IS NOT NULL AND airline_name NOT IN ('Blocked');

changeSet.author: yuzdzhan.ahmed
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO aircraft (aircraft_reg, iata_code, aircraft_age, first_flight_date, delivery_date, registration_date, construction_number, plane_owner, airline_iata_code, aircraft_type_id) SELECT ar.registration_number, ar.iata_code_short, ar.plane_age, ar.first_flight_date, ar.delivery_date, ar.registration_date, ar.construction_number, ar.plane_owner, ar.airline_iata_code, at.id FROM airplane_raw ar LEFT JOIN aircraft_type at ON ar.iata_code_short = at.iata_code WHERE ar.registration_number IS NOT NULL;

changeSet.author: yuzdzhan.ahmed
yuzdzhan.ahmed
changeSet.sql: UPDATE historical_flight_raw SET departure_actual = departure_scheduled WHERE departure_actual IS NULL AND departure_scheduled IS NOT NULL;

changeSet.author: yuzdzhan.ahmed
changeSet.sql: UPDATE historical_flight_raw SET arrival_actual = arrival_scheduled WHERE arrival_actual IS NULL AND arrival_scheduled IS NOT NULL;

changeSet.author: yuzdzhan.ahmed
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO flight ( flight_date, departure_time, arrival_time, range, departure_iata_code, arrival_iata_code, airline_iata, airline_icao, flight_status_id, departure_airport_id, arrival_airport_id, aircraft_id, airline_id ) SELECT hfr.flight_date, hfr.departure_actual AS departure_time, hfr.arrival_actual AS arrival_time, hfr.range_post_processing AS range, hfr.departure_iata AS departure_iata_code, hfr.arrival_iata AS arrival_iata_code, hfr.airline_iata AS airline_iata, hfr.airline_icao AS airline_icao, (SELECT id FROM flight_status WHERE status = 'LANDED') AS flight_status_id, NULL AS departure_airport_id, NULL AS arrival_airport_id, a.id AS aircraft_id, NULL AS airline_id FROM dbo.historical_flight_raw hfr LEFT JOIN aircraft a ON hfr.aircraft_registration = a.aircraft_reg WHERE hfr.flight_status = 'LANDED';

changeSet.author: yuzdzhan.ahmed
changeSet.sql: UPDATE flight SET departure_airport_id = airport.id FROM flight JOIN airport ON flight.departure_iata_code = airport.iata_code WHERE flight.departure_airport_id IS NULL;

changeSet.author: yuzdzhan.ahmed
changeSet.sql: UPDATE flight SET arrival_airport_id = airport.id FROM flight JOIN airport ON flight.arrival_iata_code = airport.iata_code WHERE flight.arrival_airport_id IS NULL;
